name: Hemophobia
description:
I kinda ran out of time for this one. Might expand on the idea after the game jam. It was fun tho!


THERE IS A LOT MISSING. I'M REALLY NOT HAPPY WITH HOW IT TURNED OUT.MOST THINGS DON'T HAVE TEXTURES. I MIGHT CONTINUE WORKING ON THE GAME AND FIX THESE ISSUES LATER. Co<em>ntrols: AS / arrow keys to move. W / up to Jump. S / down to crouch.</em>

You've woken up in a dark, damp facility several kilometers under the sea. And you're bleeding...

Press onwards and find some sort of escape. Be careful. As you move, your injuries increase. Will you sit and rest or make the leap of faith?

Ignore the old tech. I'm sure it's just a research base I'm Defence101 (LiesLiesLies#2799). Sounds made with https://www.beepbox.co. Pixel art made with https://www.piskelapp.com/ This concept shows some promise. I might continue developing it after the game Made in about ~12 hours for Mini-Jam 109: Depth(s) :)
